cs.NE, cs.ET, cs.AR, cs.CE, cs.LG. 

This paper discusses the implementation of synaptic dynamics in a neuromorphic IC, which falls under the field of neural engineering (cs.NE) and electronic engineering (cs.ET). The use of switched capacitor circuits is a common technique in analog and mixed-signal circuit design (cs.AR and cs.CE). Finally, the paper also discusses the benefits of technology scaling, which is a topic often discussed in machine learning and computer engineering (cs.LG).
